PARAM.name: ip
PARAM.help: Matches against IPv4 parameters against prefix lists

PARAM.name: address
PARAM.help: Matches against one or more IP prefix lists

PARAM.name: WORD
PARAM.help: Name of the access group or list

PARAM.name: next-hop
PARAM.help: Matches next-hop address of a route to one or more IP prefix lists

PARAM.name: ipv6
PARAM.help: Matches against IPv6 parameters against prefix lists

PARAM.name: address
PARAM.help: Matches against one or more IP prefix lists

PARAM.name: WORD
PARAM.help: Name of the access group or list

PARAM.name: next-hop
PARAM.help: Matches next-hop address of a route to one or more IP prefix lists

PARAM.name: metric
PARAM.help: Matches the route metric against metric values

PARAM.name: metric-value
PARAM.help: Value to match the route metric against

PARAM.name: route-type
PARAM.help: Matches against a type of route

PARAM.name: tag
PARAM.help: Matches a route against a tag for filtering

COMMAND.name: set
COMMAND.help: Set values in destination routing protocol

PARAM.name: delete
PARAM.help: Remove community attribute of a BGP update

PARAM.name: community
PARAM.help: Sets the community attribute for a BGP route update

PARAM.name: delete
PARAM.help: Remove extcommunity attribute of a BGP update

PARAM.name: extcommunity
PARAM.help: Sets the extended community attribute for a BGP route update

PARAM.name: level
PARAM.help: Sets the area to import routes for IS-IS

PARAM.name: local-preference
PARAM.help: Set BGP local preference path attribute

PARAM.name: metric
PARAM.help: Adds or subtracts from the existing metric value

PARAM.name: metric-type
PARAM.help: Sets the metric type for destination routing protocol

PARAM.name: internal
PARAM.help: Use IGP metric as the MED for BGP

PARAM.name: tag
PARAM.help: Sets the tag value for destination routing protocol

PARAM.name: weight
PARAM.help: Sets the weight for the BGP route

COMMAND.name: no
COMMAND.help: Negate a command or set its defaults
